scenario_text.value: Agumon! Oh, I’m so glad you’re okay.

Yeah, me too. Now I can make sure you’re
served up as a sacrifice.

...Wait, what? Agumon, did you just say
“sacrifice,” or...?
Hmm? Well of course I did?

Offering human children up as sacrifices is
only natural, isn’t it?

This fate is unavoidable. So please, Takuma,
don’t put up any futile resistance.
Ah! You’re a fake, aren’t you?!
Oh man... This sort of attack is the worst...
